title: The Traitor's Pyre
description: The armory gave the city hope, but a high-ranking Warden Captain has defected, taking the Scourge-Fringe's defensive codes to the horde.

turns.narrative: You track the traitor to a ruined outpost a mile into the wastes. He is currently trading the code cylinder to a massive Scourge Executioner.
turns.choice_a: Snipe the code cylinder out of his hand
turns.consequence_a: The shot shatters the cylinder. The Executioner, angered, rips the traitor in half and charges you.
turns.choice_b: Ambush the meeting with an incendiary grenade
turns.consequence_b: The fire engulfs both of them. The Executioner shakes it off, but the traitor drops the cylinder and flees.

turns.narrative: If you are fighting the Executioner, it wields a massive guillotine blade on a chain.
turns.consequence_a: The blade buries itself in the rock. You run up the chain and strike the beast's neck for a massive critical hit.
turns.choice_b: Block the blade with your shield
turns.consequence_b: The impact shatters your arm and your shield, causing massive damage before you can counter-attack.

cylinder_recovered.description: You burned the traitor and recovered the codes.

cylinder_destroyed.description: You destroyed the codes to keep them from the enemy.

conclusion: You burned the traitor and recovered the codes.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
